meanings.sent1: The rarest flower in the garden is the uncommonest.
meanings.sent2: The unicorn is an uncommonest creature in fairy tales.
meanings.sent3: It's quite uncommonest to see a penguin in the desert.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as uncommonest as finding a diamond in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The shooting star left an uncommonest trail across the night sky.

meanings.sent1: The uncommonest bird in the forest has bright blue feathers.
meanings.sent2: The northern lights are an uncommonest sight in this part of the world.
meanings.sent3: Seeing a kangaroo hopping on the beach would be quite uncommonest.
meanings.sent4: His talent for juggling was as uncommonest as a rainbow on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The ancient artifact was an uncommonest find for the archaeologists.

meanings.sent1: Her uncommonest choice of outfit turned heads at the party.
meanings.sent2: The storm brought an uncommonest amount of snow for this region.
meanings.sent3: It was quite uncommonest to see a cat chasing a dog instead of the other way around.
meanings.sent4: His courage in the face of danger was as uncommonest as a hero from a storybook.
meanings.sent5: The rainbow-colored butterfly was an uncommonest beauty in the garden.
